content: The fourth quarter, we reported a net loss of $0.16 per diluted share compared to net income of $0.92 per diluted share for the fourth quarter of 2021. For the full year 2022, we reported net income attributable to common shareholders of $0.51 per diluted share compared to net income of $3.93 per diluted share for the same period in 2021. Earnings available for distribution was $2.75 per diluted share year-to-date compared to $1.89 per diluted share in the same period of 2021, an increase of 45.5%. Cash flow available for distribution was $3.21 per diluted share year-to-date compared to $2.21 per diluted share in the same period of 2021, an increase of 45.2%. During the fourth quarter, the loan portfolio continued to perform strongly and is currently composed of 85 individual assets with approximately $1.7 billion of total outstanding principal. From the beginning of the fourth quarter through today, we were able to close four new investments totaling approximately $34 million with a weighted average unlevered yield of 11.8%.
